description:
Uppgötvaðu „Mitt Golf“ frá Golfsambandi Íslands (GSI) sem var hannað til að einfalda og bæta upplifun kylfinga og golfklúbba á Íslandi.

Með „Mitt Golf“ færð þú auðveldan aðgang að forgjöfinni þinni, mótayfirlit á landsvísu, fréttum og golfreglum.

Appið auðveldar samskipti milli klúbba og meðlima, bókun rástíma sem og samþættingu við kerfi heimaklúbbsins.

Appið er í þróun og ný virkni bætist reglulega við.

Allt um golfið á einum stað í “Mitt Golf“.

Abler (Sportabler) is a team management and calendar application that simplifies all communication, planning and organisation. With Abler everything is accessible from one source in an organised way. Instantly you will know where to be, what to bring, who will attend, statistics and much more. Abler is for admins, coaches, members, players and guardians. 

To reduce “noise”, all communication and notifications are organised and filtered so that you only receive information relevant to you. Managers are able to have an unparalleled in depth analysis and overview of the operation of their organization.

Abler is developed in collaboration with Iceland´s leading sports organisations.

IRONMAN Tracker provides official real-time athlete tracking for select global IRONMAN and IRONMAN 70.3 endurance events. We bring the excitement of race day to spectators and fans by delivering real-time results for professional and age-group racing.   
 
Features:
-Track an athlete’s times, paces, split estimates, and division placement in real time
-Interact with live maps of the course
-Track multiple athletes at the same time
-Receive push notifications as progress is made
-Follow important event information and updates
-Share updates to various social media platforms

developer: The Football Association Premier League Ltd
description:
The new Premier League App provides real-time access to every score,
stat & story from the most watched football league in the world.


Follow the action live with Matchday Live, featuring verified live scores,
stats and stories from every match; Discover more with the PL Companion;
and Join myPremierLeague to personalise the App to the Matches, Players
and Clubs that matter most to you, play Fantasy Premier League, listen to
Premier League Radio, and watch every Premier League match ever played.


Follow live, get closer to the Premier League’s Clubs and Players, and shape

Follow every game with Matchday Live:
Verified live scores, statistics and table updates,
including links to watch official broadcasts live
wherever you are

Don’t miss a moment with Matchday Stories:
Vertical storytelling of every match from every
ground as it happens

Personalise your app with myPremierLeague:
Follow the players, Clubs and matches that
matter most to you

Listen live with Premier League Radio:
All the action as it happens from around the
Premier League (excl. UK and Ireland)

Play Fantasy Premier League:
The world’s biggest fantasy football game,
in Classic, Draft and Challenge format

Explore every Premier League match ever played:
Including video, statistics and kits since 1992

Discover clubs and players:
Get closer with behind the scenes stories

Spiideo makes sports video recording easy.

Thanks to the pre-installed Spiideo cameras in your arena the Spiideo system is always available. It’s always there, it’s always on. At the touch of a button, coaches can record their team and athletes record themselves for self-led training.
No manual camera handling, no camera man, no handling of video files. All you need is the easy-to-use app. This is sports video recording made easy.

Use the Spiideo app to view videos recorded by Spiideo cameras installed in your arena/stadium.

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Stay connected and share your feedback we'd love to hear from you:
X: X.com/fotmob
Instagram: instagram.com/fotmobapp
Facebook: facebook.com/fotmob
TikTok: tiktok.com/@fotmobapp
Web: www.fotmob.com

Trackman Golf is the one-stop-shop for all your Trackman activities. Better golf starts here.
 
The app gives you comprehensive access to all data registered during your indoor and outdoor Trackman activities, allowing you to analyze your practice and play performance and track your improvements, regardless of your golf skill level.
 
Enjoy the power of the Trackman tracking technology while using Trackman range, and access detailed data reports summarizing and providing insights on all your Trackman range, simulator and practice sessions.
 
Features include:
• Live ball-data tracking for Trackman range sessions (carry, total distance, ball speed, height, launch angle and more)
• Activity overview with insightful reports for all Trackman range, indoor and practice activities
• Games that will make you stay longer on the range and compete with friends
• Your personal Trackman account with lifetime statistics including your Trackman handicap
• Updated leaderboards across competitions
• Quick login to easily connect your Trackman personal profile and immediately start tracking your golf performance
• Available in different languages (currently English, Spanish, German, French, Chinese Japanese and Korean)
 
Download Trackman Golf to unleash your potential and make practicing or playing golf a more rewarding experience, whenever you want and wherever you are.

In Veo Live you can watch live sports streaming from teams and clubs around the world, as it happens.

This means that you can watch your kids, your friends, or your local heroes perform like never before.

When a club live-streams using a Veo camera, their followers receive a notification which will take them straight to the action in the Live App.

Even more, you can beam this up onto larger devices via Chromecast or Airplay to really amplify the live experience!

Come and discover new teams. Discover new athletes. Build your live sports community through the Veo Live app.

Góða skemmtun!

Stay ahead of every sporting moment with live scores, stats, and schedules. Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Track every phase of the NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA, and top tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Australian Open, and the ATP & WTA Tours—all in one app.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC
• Cricket - ICC World Cup, Indian Premier League (IPL)

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

Privacy policy: https://www.sofascore.com/privacy-policy
Terms of use: https://www.sofascore.com/terms-and-conditions

Experience Formula 1 like never before with our official app!

Your one-stop hub keeps you updated with the latest F1 news, thrilling highlights, race results, action-packed videos, real-time results and detailed schedules.

Stay ahead of the curve with:
•	The latest F1 news and expert technical analysis
•	Race weekend schedules and real-time results
•	Manage your F1 Fantasy team 
•	Free Leaderboard with live timings
•	Driver and conductor standings 

For F1 TV Access® subscribers, unlock a world of exclusive content including:
•	Live telemetry data and session insights, including comprehensive tyre Information, lap times, speed and DRS.
•	Real-time interactive Driver Tracker Maps
•	Live English audio commentary
•	Listen to the drama unfold with the best of Team Radio

Download now for your ultimate companion into the world of Formula 1.

How to subscribe to F1® TV

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/terms-of-use
Subscription terms and conditions: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/subscription-terms
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

Target DartCounter is the world’s biggest darts scorer app for keeping track of all your scores. Play x01 games, Cricket, Around the Clock and several other training games.
Play online against your friends or challenge the computer dartbot.
In the x01 games you will hear the voice of MasterCaller Ray Martin who will announce your name and all your scores.

Register or log in and all your games will be saved.
Play with multiple players with a DartCounter account and the whole game will be saved in both accounts.

IN-APP PURCHASES 
The app offers one in-app purchases; "Ultimate Yearly" and "Ultimate Monthly". These are annual  and monthly auto renewable subscription which gives you access to more features and statistics to improve your darts skills.

When you own this subscription you will get the newest gameplays earlier than the users without the subscription. Also, we will keep adding more Ultimate features in the future updates to make the usage easier, more detailed and even more fun!

GENERAL PAYMENT INFORMATION
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase


PRICING
The Ultimate Yearly subscription costs $34.99 USD each year, the Ultimate Monthly subscription costs $4.99 USD each year. This will be automatically converted to your own currency by iTunes. For more information about the annual payment or how to cancel auto renewing, read "Payment & Cancellation".


PAYMENT & CANCELLATION
The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

24 hours before the end of each subscription period (one year) you'll automatically be charged the same amount as you've paid for the initial purchase.
After renewing, your subscription will be valid for another year.

You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes/App Store account settings; 
you must do so at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period to avoid being billed for the next cycle. 
-------------------------------------------------
AGREEMENT
https://dartcounter.net/terms-of-service

PRIVACY POLICY
https://dartcounter.net/privacy-policy

Darts Scorer App Score Counter 2025 is designed for darts lovers.
With this app you can easily count scores while playing X01 and Cricket darts games with your friends. App calculates all points, statistics and automatically determines the winner. In the application you can choose players, the number of Legs and Sets, the game mode and the number of scores 301, 501. It is also possible to save games and play them later. You don't need to buy a special Scoreboard or scorekeeper, everything is available in your phone. Download and track game results with this easy-to-use and free darts calculator.

Experience the thrill of Formula 1® with F1 TV Access. Relive race archives, enjoy exclusive shows, and dive into detailed data, all from your favorite devices.

With F1 TV Access, you can:
•        Get full exclusive access to Live Timing Data, Maps and Analysis
•        Watch F1 shows and documentaries

If you subscribe via iTunes:
Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current billing period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan.
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

The Ultimate Sports Entertainment Platform

DAZN is the only truly global pure-play sports entertainment platform. We uniquely integrate the entire fan experience for fans to watch, play, and socialize, all in one place.

Watch Anytime, Anywhere.
Experience sports like never before. Stream your favourite events live or on demand, on any device, from anywhere in the world. DAZN delivers the game to you, wherever you are.

Play in FanZone and Beyond
Dive into the action with FanZone. Chat live, send reactions, and connect with fellow fans in real-time. It’s your front-row seat to the heart of the game.

Connect with Fans
Join the community. Chat with fans, share your passion, and celebrate every victory together. On DAZN, every game is a social event.

DAZN brings you the ultimate sports streaming experience with a world of content available anytime, anywhere:

• Dive into the “Home of Boxing”, featuring top events, schedules, fighter profiles, and exclusive content, including Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship (BKFC).
• Stay up-to-date with the “Schedule” feature, setting alerts for your favourite games across sports like American Football, Basketball, and Tennis.
• Navigate effortlessly with the new sub-navigation bar to quickly access your favourite competitions like Serie A. 
• Get real-time “Stats and Scores” for all games, including Men’s Football, the National League, and major tournaments like the NFL Game Pass and Courtside 1891.
• Explore full “Fight Cards” for boxing and MMA events, including the Professional Fighters League (PFL), and revisit past rounds with a single click.
• Engage with fans in the “FanZone” by cheering, chatting, sending reactions, and participating in polls.
• Manage your account with ease using the updated profile section.
• Browse and watch a variety of live channels with the EPG for live channels feature, including content from Red Bull TV, Padel TIME TV, and thrilling events like Riyadh Season.

DAZN holds the world’s largest portfolio of sports broadcasting rights, including:
• History-making fights from Matchroom Promotions, Queensbury, Golden Boy Promotions, and BKFC.
• Exclusive access to NFL Game Pass, bringing every game of the NFL.
• European football including Serie A and National League.
• NHL.TV: Experience every game from every team, live and on demand all season long. The world’s best hockey, all in one place.
• All the action from the NCAA College Football season.
• Basketball action, including Courtside 1891.
• The best of live Women’s Football, including Liga F, NWSL, and Frauen-Bundesliga.
• Exciting MMA content from the Professional Fighters League (PFL), Naciones MMA, and more.
• Unique sports like Padel, global tournaments in Tennis, and diverse events like Riyadh Season.
• Over 10 linear TV channels on our platform with 24/7 content, including Red Bull TV, Matchroom Snooker, Lacrosse TV, and more.
• A rich library of video-on-demand (VOD) content, including sports documentaries, features, and shows.

DAZN is your gateway to sports, bringing you closer to the action than ever before.

Terms of Use https://www.dazn.com/en-US/help/articles/pp-tcs-all
Privacy Policy: https://www.dazn.com/en-US/help/articles/pp-tcs-all

developer: International Ski and Snowboard Federation FIS
description: Calling all winter sports fans! The Official FIS App remains the #1 hub for Alpine Skiing, Cross‑Country, Ski Jumping, Freeski, Snowboard, Nordic Combined and more. Now you can dive deeper with Vertical Stories that highlight the best moments from our events, and a brand‑new Gaming Zone featuring an exciting fantasy game plus trivia quizzes. Tune into the latest happenings with FIS Live Radio and catch exclusive podcasts from athletes, experts and behind‑the‑scenes stories. Follow live races, view FIS TV highlights, check results and stats all in one place. Download now and immerse yourself in the world of winter sports like never before.

We all follow United – anytime, anywhere! Join millions of fans globally who use the official Manchester United app every day. Experience the club like never before with exclusive content, live match updates, MUTV shows and match predictions, plus the United Store, and your match tickets – all in one place.

Top Features You'll Love

• Get closer with MUTV: Stream MUTV live and on-demand, with selected live matches, including Men's Tour games, Women’s and Academy matches.

• Your Matchday Companion: Get the line-up first, follow live stats, real-time scores, and all the build-up and reaction in Match Centre.

• Play and win with United Predictions: Predict scores, line-ups, and key moments to win exciting prizes.

• Shop the United Store: Show your colours and purchase authentic United shirts, exclusive fashion wear, accessories, and merchandise directly in the app.

• View Match Tickets: Securely access, manage, and display your match tickets quickly and easily, all within the app.

• Exclusive Access: Watch live press conferences with the manager and exclusive interviews with players as we take you behind the scenes at your club.

• Every game, every goal: In-depth match highlights and full game replays for every fixture, plus explore our Premier League archive of every iconic goal, match, and moment.

One app for everything United – don't miss out, download now for FREE and be part of the United family!

=====

Get early access and experience the new version of Upgame by Trackman. 
New features include - 

* All new design and navigation - Explore an intuitive way of viewing and understanding your data

Celebrating a decade of creativity and innovation with our biggest update yet. Version 11 comes packed with exciting new features and improvements that take custom card creation to a whole new level.

What’s New:

• Revamped UI: Enjoy a sleek, intuitive design with a completely new app interface that makes customisation smoother and more enjoyable.
• Higher Quality Cards: Stand out with stunning, high-resolution cards that give your creations a professional finish.
• Auto Mask Tool: Quickly and easily remove backgrounds from your photos with our new real-time auto mask feature for flawless personalisation.
• Classic Favourites: Revisit a handpicked selection of cards from the past 5 years that you’ve loved.

Create Your Custom FUT Card:

• Fully customise every detail—from the name and statistics to the design of your card.
• Choose from 213 Nations and over a hundred unique card designs.
• Add your personal photo using the front camera or from your camera roll*.

Share Your Masterpiece:

• Easily share your custom card on Facebook, X, Instagram, WhatsApp, and more!

*Camera and camera roll permissions are required to add your own pictures.

Disclaimer: This is an unofficial app. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by Electronic Arts Inc. or EA Sports FC. All related assets are property of Electronic Arts Inc. and its licensors.

The Veo Camera App provides easy connectivity to your Veo Camera 1, 2 & 3. Giving you full control, with intuitive navigation, to start and stop your recording or livestream. Manage and view your recordings with instant playback. Stay informed of your camera status and camera health metrics.

Veo is an AI powered sport analysis tool, allowing you to capture your game with ease. Our AI automatically tracks the ball and detects key events during the game. So you no longer need a camera man and can quickly and effectively analyze your game.

After uploading the recording to the Veo platform, you will receive a full breakdown of the game. With the ability to edit, draw, clip and share highlights with players and fans. With analytics you can see possession, heat maps and more statistics. Get started today!

The Veo Camera app features:
- Easy first time setup guide
- Two tap recording start
- Livestream to Veo Live and external streaming destinations
- Manage and assign your recordings
- Analyze your game at halftime or directly after with instant playback
- Add bookmarks while recording or live streaming and analyse along with the game.
- And much more to come….

COMET is a state-of-the-art, market-leading solution for management and automation of key operations in sports associations, leagues and governing bodies.

The COMET Football app allows authorized COMET Users, such as Clubs, Referees and Competition Managers, to manage match-related operations from anywhere anytime. Most common features of COMET Football App are the following:

Clubs

· view upcoming and previous matches of the club across all competitions

· enter and confirm lineups, team officials and kits

· enter, if authorized, match events in real-time unofficial mode

· receive push notifications in relation to relevant match updates

Referees

· view upcoming and previous appointed matches

· approve or reject match appointments

· enter/review match events and confirm the match report

· receive push notifications in relation to relevant match updates

Competition Managers

· view all relevant competitions and access previous and upcoming matches

· reschedule the match, update the location or match status

· update appointments of referees and other match officials

· if needed, fully administer the match, on behalf of the club or the referee

Specific options may vary depending on COMET configuration and authorization settings at your Association.
